verses.verse: And Hannah<WH2584> prayed<WH6419>, and said<WH559>: My heart<WH3820> exulteth<WH5970> in Jehovah<WH3068>; My horn<WH7161> is exalted<WH7311> in Jehovah<WH3068>; My mouth<WH6310> is enlarged<WH7337> over mine enemies<WH341>; Because I rejoice<WH8055> in thy salvation<WH3444>.
There is none holy<WH6918> as Jehovah<WH3068>; For there is none besides<WH1115> thee<WH6697>, Neither is there any rock like our God<WH430>.

Talk <WH1696> no more<WH7235> so exceeding<WH1364> proudly<WH1364>; Let not arrogancy<WH6277> come<WH3318> out of your mouth<WH6310>; For Jehovah<WH3068> is a God<WH410> of knowledge<WH1844>, And by him actions<WH5949> are weighed<WH8505>.
The bows<WH7198> of the mighty men<WH1368> are broken<WH2844>; And they that stumbled<WH3782> are girded<WH247> with strength<WH2428>.

They that were full<WH7649> have hired out<WH7936> themselves for bread<WH3899>; And they that were hungry<WH7457> have ceased<WH2308> to hunger<WH6135>: Yea, the barren hath borne<WH3205> seven<WH7651>; And she that hath many<WH7227> children<WH1121> languisheth<WH535>.
Jehovah <WH3068> killeth<WH4191>, and maketh alive<WH2421>: He bringeth down<WH3381> to Sheol<WH7585>, and bringeth up<WH5927>.
Jehovah <WH3068> maketh poor<WH3423>, and maketh rich<WH6238>: He bringeth low<WH8213>, he also<WH637> lifteth up<WH7311>.

He raiseth up<WH6965> the poor<WH1800> out of the dust<WH6083>, He lifteth up<WH7311> the needy<WH34> from the dunghill<WH830>, To make them sit<WH3427> with princes<WH5081>, And inherit<WH5157> the throne<WH3678> of glory<WH3519>: For the pillars<WH4690> of the earth<WH776> are Jehovah<WH3068>'s, And he hath set<WH7896> the world upon them<WH8398>.

He will keep<WH8104> the feet<WH7272> of his holy ones<WH2623>; But the wicked<WH7563> shall be put to silence<WH1826> in darkness<WH2822>; For by strength<WH3581> shall no man<WH376> prevail<WH1396>.

They that strive<WH7378> with Jehovah<WH3068> shall be broken to pieces<WH2865>; Against them will he thunder<WH7481> in heaven<WH8064>: Jehovah<WH3068> will judge<WH1777> the ends<WH657> of the earth<WH776>; And he will give<WH5414> strength<WH5797> unto his king<WH4428>, And exalt<WH7311> the horn<WH7161> of his anointed<WH4899>.
And Elkanah<WH511> went<WH3212> to Ramah<WH7414> to his house<WH1004>. And the child<WH5288> did<WH1961> minister<WH8334> unto Jehovah<WH3068> before<WH6440> Eli<WH5941> the priest<WH3548>.
Now the sons<WH1121> of Eli<WH5941> were base<WH1100> men<WH1121>; they knew<WH3045> not Jehovah<WH3068>.

And the custom<WH4941> of the priests<WH3548> with the people<WH5971> was<WH376>, that, when any man offered<WH2076> sacrifice<WH2077>, the priest<WH3548>'s servant<WH5288> came<WH935>, while the flesh<WH1320> was boiling<WH1310>, with a flesh-hook<WH4207> of three<WH7969> teeth<WH8127> in his hand<WH3027>;

and he struck<WH5221> it into the pan<WH3595>, or kettle<WH1731>, or caldron<WH7037>, or pot<WH6517>; all that the flesh-hook<WH4207> brought up<WH5927> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> therewith<WH6213>. So they did in Shiloh<WH7887> unto all the Israelites<WH3478> that came thither<WH935>.

Yea <WH6999>, before they burnt the fat<WH2459>, the priest<WH3548>'s servant<WH5288> came<WH935>, and said<WH559> to the man<WH376> that sacrificed<WH2076>, Give<WH5414> flesh<WH1320> to roast<WH6740> for the priest<WH3548>; for he will not have<WH3947> boiled<WH1310> flesh<WH1320> of thee<WH2416>, but raw.

And if the man<WH376> said<WH559> unto him<WH6999>, They will surely burn<WH6999> the fat<WH2459> first<WH3117>, and then take<WH3947> as much as thy soul<WH5315> desireth<WH183>; then he would say<WH559>, Nay<WH5414>, but thou shalt give it me now<WH3947>: and if not, I will take it by force<WH2394>.
And the sin<WH2403> of the young men<WH5288> was very<WH3966> great<WH1419> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; for the men<WH582> despised<WH5006> the offering<WH4503> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
But Samuel<WH8050> ministered<WH8334> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, being a child<WH5288>, girded<WH2296> with a linen<WH906> ephod<WH646>.

Moreover his mother<WH517> made<WH6213> him a little<WH6996> robe<WH4598>, and brought<WH5927> it to him from year<WH3117> to year<WH3117>, when she came up<WH5927> with her husband<WH376> to offer<WH2076> the yearly<WH3117> sacrifice<WH2077>.

And Eli<WH5941> blessed<WH1288> Elkanah<WH511> and his wife<WH802>, and said<WH559>, Jehovah<WH3068> give<WH7760> thee seed<WH2233> of this woman<WH802> for the petition<WH7596> which was asked<WH7592> of Jehovah<WH3068>. And they went<WH1980> unto their own home<WH4725>.

And <WH3588> Jehovah<WH3068> visited<WH6485> Hannah<WH2584>, and she conceived<WH2029>, and bare<WH3205> three<WH7969> sons<WH1121> and two<WH8147> daughters<WH1323>. And the child<WH5288> Samuel<WH8050> grew<WH1431> before<WH5973> Jehovah<WH3068>.

Now Eli<WH5941> was very<WH3966> old<WH2204>; and he heard<WH8085> all that his sons<WH1121> did<WH6213> unto all Israel<WH3478>, and how that they lay<WH7901> with the women<WH802> that did service<WH6633> at the door<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.
And he said<WH559> unto them<WH6213>, Why do ye such things<WH1697>? for I hear<WH8085> of your evil<WH7451> dealings<WH1697> from all this people<WH5971>.
Nay <WH1121>, my sons; for it is no good<WH2896> report<WH8052> that I hear<WH8085>: ye make Jehovah<WH3068>'s people<WH5971> to transgress<WH5674>.

If one man<WH376> sin<WH2398> against another<WH376>, God<WH430> shall judge<WH6419> him<WH376>; but if a man sin<WH2398> against Jehovah<WH3068>, who shall entreat<WH6419> for him<WH8085>? Notwithstanding, they hearkened not unto the voice<WH6963> of their father<WH1>, because Jehovah<WH3068> was minded<WH2654> to slay them<WH4191>.
And the child<WH5288> Samuel<WH8050> grew<WH1432> on<WH1980>, and increased in favor<WH2896> both with Jehovah<WH3068>, and also with men<WH582>.

And there came<WH935> a man<WH376> of God<WH430> unto Eli<WH5941>, and said<WH559> unto him<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068>, Did I reveal<WH1540> myself<WH1540> unto the house<WH1004> of thy father<WH1>, when they were in Egypt<WH4714> in bondage to Pharaoh<WH6547>'s house<WH1004>?

and did I choose<WH977> him out of all the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> to be my priest<WH3548>, to go<WH5927> up unto mine altar<WH4196>, to burn<WH6999> incense<WH7004>, to wear<WH5375> an ephod<WH646> before<WH6440> me<WH5414>? and did I give unto the house<WH1004> of thy father<WH1> all the offerings of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> made by fire<WH801>?

Wherefore kick<WH1163> ye at my sacrifice<WH2077> and at mine offering<WH4503>, which I have commanded<WH6680> in my habitation<WH4583>, and honorest<WH3513> thy sons<WH1121> above me<WH1254>, to make yourselves fat with the chiefest<WH7225> of all the offerings<WH4503> of Israel<WH3478> my people<WH5971>?

Therefore Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002>, I said<WH559> indeed<WH559> that thy house<WH1004>, and the house<WH1004> of thy father<WH1>, should walk<WH1980> before<WH6440> me for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>: but now Jehovah<WH3068> saith<WH5002>, Be it far from me<WH2486>; for them that honor<WH3513> me I will honor<WH3513>, and they that despise<WH959> me shall be lightly esteemed<WH7043>.

Behold <WH3117>, the days come<WH935>, that I will cut off<WH1438> thine arm<WH2220>, and the arm<WH2220> of thy father<WH1>'s house<WH1004>, that there shall not be an old man<WH2205> in thy house<WH1004>.

And thou shalt behold<WH5027> the affliction<WH6862> of my habitation<WH4583>, in all the wealth which God shall give<WH3190> Israel<WH3478>; and there shall not be an old man<WH2205> in thy house<WH1004> for ever<WH3117>.

And the man<WH376> of thine<WH3772>, whom I shall not cut off from mine altar<WH4196>, shall be to consume<WH3615> thine eyes<WH5869>, and to grieve<WH109> thy heart<WH5315>; and all the increase<WH4768> of thy house<WH1004> shall die<WH4191> in the flower of their age<WH582>.

And this shall be the sign<WH226> unto thee<WH935>, that shall come upon thy two<WH8147> sons<WH1121>, on Hophni<WH2652> and Phinehas<WH6372>: in one<WH259> day<WH3117> they shall die<WH4191> both of them<WH8147>.

And I will raise me up<WH6965> a faithful<WH539> priest<WH3548>, that shall do<WH6213> according to that which is in my heart<WH3824> and in my mind<WH5315>: and I will build<WH1129> him a sure<WH539> house<WH1004>; and he shall walk<WH1980> before<WH6440> mine anointed<WH4899> for ever<WH3117>.

And it shall come to pass<WH3498>, that every one that is left in thy house<WH1004> shall come<WH935> and bow down<WH7812> to him for a piece<WH95> of silver<WH3701> and a loaf<WH3603> of bread<WH3899>, and shall say<WH559>, Put<WH5596> me<WH259>, I pray thee, into one of the priests<WH3550>' offices, that I may eat<WH398> a morsel<WH6595> of bread<WH3899>.
